thread.title: British expat blogger in Normandy shares stories about her stylish French girlfriends
thread.title_full: British expat blogger in Normandy shares stories about her stylish French girlfriends

author: Mariana Greene
title: British expat blogger in Normandy shares stories about her stylish French girlfriends
text:
British expat blogger in Normandy shares stories about her stylish French girlfriends Filed under Home at Get Daily Dallas News Headlines Sign Up 
Sharon Santoni, a British expat blogger living in Normandy, will talk about her life in the French countryside and sign copies of her current book at several Dallas locations March 30 and 31. My Stylish French Girlfriends (Gibbs Smith, $40) by Sharon Santoni, British expat blogger Gibbs Smith 
With an international following, Santoni writes about antiquing, entertaining and home decorating a la francaise on her blog, My French Country Home . Her current book, My Stylish French Girlfriends (Gibbs Smith, $40), introduces 20 chic, creative French women and walks readers through their daily lives at work or at home. Gardens, dogs and flower arranging feature prominently in photography as well as women with that enviable Parisian je ne sais quoi . Sharon Santoni, a British expat blogger in Normandy, cutting dahlias in her garden at her house. Sharon Santoni 
In addition to book signings at Dallas retailers Blue Print and Brown & Co. , Santoni will speak about her expat life at Alliance Francaise de Dallas . 
March 30: Book signing at Blue Print from 11 a.m.-1 p.m. 2707 Fairmount St., and 3 p.m.-5 p.m. at Brown & Co., 1333 Oak Lawn Ave. 
March 31: Santoni will speak about her life as a British expat and sign books. 6:30 p.m. Alliance Francaise de Dallas, 10830 N. Central Expressway, Suite 252. The public is welcome, but first email to reserve a spot. The garden at Sharon Santoni's house in Normandy. Sharon Santoni
